author: costin
msg: Parse the name of the channel, extract host an port.
No longer need to specify the port and host, just use the 'normal' convention.
( same thing is done in worker - so it doesn't matter what you configure,
channel or worker, you'll have to do it only once and the name is enough )
Create the worker automatically if none specified.

author: costin
msg: Few cosmetic ( and not only ) changes.
Save the localName and the object pool in jk_bean - this eliminates a lot
Added the tmpPool to env ( see next commit for details )

author: costin
msg: Moved the create method, use the more acurate method to extract the object

author: costin
msg: Magic to set the channel. The worker.init() will create a channel
( it'll be better to configure the channel and

author: costin
msg: Added a better creation method ( moved from jk_config ), easier to use.
It uses the full name and return the jk_bean ( to be used for futher config )
